sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper PC Windows
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT tblAssets.AssetID , tblSystemEnclosure.SMBIOSAssetTag AS AssetTag , CASE WHEN EXISTS(select * from tblPrinters WHERE tblPrinters.ASsetID = tblAssets.AssetID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CanPrint , 'Hardware' AS Category , CASE WHEN tDiskDrives.CDDriveCount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CD , TsysChassisTypes.ChassisName AS ChassisType
, tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblAssets.Mac)), '') AS CorrelationID , tmpProcessor.NumberOfCores AS CpuCoreCount , CAST((tmpProcessor.NumberOfLogicalProcessors / tmpProcessor.NumberOfCores) AS INT) AS CPUCoreThread
, tblAssets.NrProcessors AS CPUCount , tmpProcessor.Manufacturer AS CpuManufacturer , tmpProcessor.CPUName AS CpuName , tmpProcessor.MaxClockSpeed AS CpuSpeedMhz , tblAssets.Processor AS CPUType , tNetwork.DefaultIPGateway AS DefaultGateway , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , tDiskDrives.TotalGB AS DiskSpaceGB , tNetwork.DNSDomain AS DNSDomain , tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered , TsysChassisTypes.ChassisName AS FormFactor , tblAssets.FQDN AS FQDN , 'installed' AS HardwareStatus , 'in_use' AS SubStatus , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.IPAddress AS IPAddress , tblAssets.Lastseen AS MostRecentDiscovery , tblAssets.Mac AS MACAddress , tblAssetCustom.Manufacturer AS Manufacturer , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelID , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelNumber , tblAssets.AssetName AS [Name]
, tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , tsysOS.OSname As OperatingSystem
, CASE WHEN tblComputerSystem.SystemType LIKE '%x86%' THEN 32 WHEN tblComputerSystem.SystemType LIKE '%x64%' THEN 64 END AS OSAddressWidth
, tblAssets.Domain AS OSDomain , tblAssets.SP As OSServicePack , tblOperatingsystem.Version as OSVersion , tblAssetCustom.PurchaseDate AS Purchased , tblAssets.Memory AS RAM_MB , tblAssetCustom.Serialnumber AS SerialNumber , tblAssets.Description AS ShortDescription , 'Computer' AS Subcategory , tblAssets.Domain AS Domain , tblAssetCustom.Warrantydate AS WarrantyExpiration , 'WindowsPC' AS SourceName FROM tblAssets INNER JOIN tblComputersystem ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblComputersystem.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblSystemEnclosure On tblAssets.AssetID = tblSystemEnclosure.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN TsysChassisTypes ON tblSystemEnclosure.ChassisTypes = TsysChassisTypes.Chassistype
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tblNetwork.AssetID , tblNetwork.IPAddress , tblNetwork.Description , DefaultIPGateway , DNSDomain , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AssetID ORDER BY Description ASC) AS tNetworkRowNo FROM tblNetwork WHERE tblNetwork.IPEnabled = 1 and tblNetwork.DHCPenabled = 1 /* check this */ -- changed from an OR to an AND below to remove dupes and (tblNetwork.DefaultIPGateway IS NOT NULL AND tblNetwork.DNSDomain IS NOT NULL) ) tNetwork ON tblAssets.AssetID = tNetwork.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysOS On tblAssets.OScode = tsysOS.OScode LEFT OUTER JOIN tblOperatingsystem On tblAssets.AssetID = tblOperatingsystem.AssetID INNER JOIN tblAssetCustom On tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState on tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(NumberOfCores) as NumberOfCores , MAX(MaxClockSpeed) as MaxClockSpeed , MAX(NumberOfLogicalProcessors) as NumberOfLogicalProcessors , MAX(Manufacturer) as Manufacturer , MAX(Name) as CPUName FROM tblProcessor GROUP BY AssetID ) as tmpProcessor ON tblAssets.AssetID = tmpProcessor.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysIPLocations On tsysIPLocations.StartIP <= tblAssets.IPNumeric AND tsysIPLocations.EndIP >= tblAssets.IPNumeric LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , SUM(CASE WHEN FileSystem NOT IN ('CDFS', 'UDF') THEN Size ELSE 0 END) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS TotalGB , SUM(CASE WHEN DriveType = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CDDriveCount FROM tblDiskdrives WHERE FileSystem IS NOT NULL GROUP BY AssetID ) tDiskDrives ON tDiskDrives.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID WHERE (tblComputersystem.SystemType Like 'x86%' or tblComputersystem.SystemType Like 'x64%') AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole IN (0,1) -- standalone or member
-- Docking Station form factors were causing duplicates AND COALESCE(TsysChassisTypes.ChassisName, 'NONE') NOT IN ('Docking Station', 'Peripheral') -- multiNics were causing duplicates AND COALESCE(tNetworkRowNo, 1) = 1
